entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
